q: Andy Coulson denies being aware of any wrongdoing at the paper, part of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp media group, and police said last month there was not enough evidence to charge him with any crime. Obviously when he was editor of the News of the World, bad things happened at that newspaper and when he found about those, he resigned. That was the right thing to do, David Cameron told BBC Radio 4's Today program. "I gave him a second chance," David Cameron added. "I think he has done a good job for the government and for the country.
